description: New thread - Lead's first reply to agent

mailgun_payload.subject: Interested in 2024 Honda Accord
mailgun_payload.body-plain:
Hi Riley,

I saw your listing for the 2024 Honda Accord and I'm very interested. Could you tell me more about the available colors and financing options?

Thanks,
John Customer
(555) 123-4567
